fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 10Y CAD
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR base = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "10 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "10 Yr Swap", base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "9 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "9 Yr Swap", 4/5 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "8 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "8 Yr Swap", 3/5 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "7 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "7 Yr Swap", 2/5 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "6 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "6 Yr Swap", 1/5 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "12 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "12 Yr Swap", 9/10 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "15 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "15 Yr Swap", 3/4 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "20 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "20 Yr Swap", 1/2 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "25 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "25 Yr Swap", 1/4 * base,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "11 Yr" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "11 Yr Swap", 19/20 * base,
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level Tableau IF chains into a DAX calculated column using a VAR for the repeated sum (Delta Down T CAD + Fix Value T) and SWITCH(TRUE()) to map TERM_LABEL values to the appropriate multipliers. All column references were transformed to 'Table'[Column] format.
